channel.title: Russian Podcast
channel.description: This podcast is for those who already know basic grammar and want to improve their Russian. If you don't speak Russian at all, but can understand a few words, you still can listen to this podcast, it will help you too. The audios are entirely in Russian!
channel.itunes:author: Татьяна Климова
channel.itunes:subtitle: Intermediate-level Russian-language podcast
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast is for those who already know basic grammar and want to improve their Russian. If you don't speak Russian at all, but can understand a few words, you still can listen to this podcast, it will help you too. The audios are entirely in Russian!
